data.text: @NBCTheVoice @gwenstefani From the blonde girl I saw in the promo vid to the person I stan so much right now. Thanks @NBCTheVoice 😊
@NBCTheVoice @aliciakeys @gwenstefani Especially Gwen, who knew she was involved in my life since I was 5. If I wasn't a careless kid. 😂
@NBCTheVoice @aliciakeys @gwenstefani When I saw them on the show, they were strangers to me cuz I don't know them. I just know their music. Now, I'm actually stanning them 😂💖 1/
